name: Cat Puncher
description: Four legged fighters from across the globe are gathering for the ultimate feline fighting tournament. Choose a cat, gather your courage and get ready to take on your opponents in an all out brawl! Play on your own or pummel a friend in two-player mode! The simple, intuitive controls make it easy to play, even with two people on the same screen. Charge up your attacks and unleash powerful super combos on your enemies. Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate Cat Puncher?
